Text: The Voyage (roller coaster):  Designed and built by The Gravity Group with the help of designers Mike Graham, Korey Kiepert, Larry Bill, Chad Miller, and former park President Will Koch, the roller coaster is themed to the famous voyage of the "Mayflower" by Pilgrims to North America in 1620.
